title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: 2. Ainmnítear pobal a shonraítear sa Sceideal mar Líonra Gaeilge chun
text_raw:
2. Ainmnítear pobal a shonraítear sa Sceideal mar Líonra Gaeilge chun 

críocha alt 11(1) d’Acht na Gaeltachta, 2012 (Uimh. 34 de 2012). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 9 Samhain, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [579] 3 

SCEIDEAL 

Líonra Gaeilge: Baile Locha Riach, Co. na Gaillimhe 

(1) Na limistéir toghroinne seo a leanas: Baile Locha Riach (Uirbeach) and 

Baile Locha Riach (Tuath). 

Líonra Gaeilge: Cluain Dolcáin, Co. Bhaile Átha Cliath 

(1) Na limistéir toghroinne seo a leanas: Cluain Dolcáin, Cluain Dolcáin-

Dún Amhlaoibh agus Cluain Dolcáin-An Mhainistir. 

Líonra Gaeilge: Inis, Co. an Chláir 

(1) An lonnaíocht seo a leanas: Inis 

Arna thabhairt faoi mo láimh, 
 13 Deireadh Fómhair 2021. 

JACK CHAMBERS, 

 Aire Stáit ag an Roinn Tuarasóireachta, Cultúir, 
Ealaíon, Gaeltachta, Spóirt agus Meán. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [579] 

Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

STATUTORY INSTRUMENTS. 

S.I. No. 579 of 2021 

________________ 

GAELTACHT ACT 2012 (DESIGNATION OF IRISH LANGUAGE 
NETWORKS) ORDER 2021 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [579] 5 

Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

S.I. No. 579 of 2021 

GAELTACHT ACT 2012 (DESIGNATION OF IRISH LANGUAGE 
NETWORKS) ORDER 2021 

I, JACK CHAMBERS, Minister of State at the Department of Tourism, Culture, 
Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, in exercise of the powers conferred on me by 
section 11(1) of the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (No. 34 of 2012) (as adapted by the 
Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht (Alteration of Name of Department and Title 
of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts, 
Gaeltacht, Sport and Media (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 
(S.I. No. 547 of 2020), hereby order as follows:

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (Designation of Irish
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (Designation of Irish 

Language Networks) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited gaeltacht act 2012 (designation irish language networks) order 2021

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: 2. A community specified in the Schedule is designated to be an Irish
text_raw:
2. A community specified in the Schedule is designated to be an Irish 
Language Network for the purposes of section 11(1) of the Gaeltacht Act 2012 
(No. 34 of 2012). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 9th November, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [579]
text_norm: 2 community specified schedule designated irish language network purpose section 11(1) gaeltacht act 2012 (no 34 2012) notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 9th november 2021 6 579

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: Irish Language Network: Loughrea, Co. Galway
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Irish Language Network: Loughrea, Co. Galway 

(1) The following electoral division areas: Loughrea Urban and Loughrea 

Rural 

Irish Language Network: Clondalkin, Co. Dublin 

(1) The following electoral division areas: Clondalkin Village, Clondalkin-

Dunawley and Clondalkin-Monastery 

Irish Language Network: Ennis, Co. Clare 

(1) The following Settlement: Ennis 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 13 October 2021 

JACK CHAMBERS, 

 Minister of State at the Department of Tourism, Culture, Arts, 

Gaeltacht, Sport and Media. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [579] 7
